comments:
To reproduce:

1. Right click on a project, select New -> Class.
2. Click Browse beside the Source Folder field.  An NPE will occur.

Here's the error details:

Message: Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.jface".
Stack trace:

java.lang.NullPointerException

at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:476)
at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:416)
at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:1124)
at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:1099)

This was caused by a static label provider instance in SourceFolderSelectionDialog. The label provider gets disposed the first time the dialog is used. Next time, the dialog resuses the now disposed label provider. Fixed by getting rid of the static instance.
